hostiles

Class Hostile

  • java.lang.Object
    • hostiles.Hostile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Boss, Enemy

    public abstract class Hostile
extends java.lang.Object
implements Entity
    Abstract class for creating Hostiles. Hostiles are entities that can interact with the player by damaging or hindering the Character.
    Author:
    jlars
